__e: Now, were you just trying to distract me while your brother cuts free?
And your guest's name? This is my wife Dorothy.
You can't just show up and distract me while my friend is in danger.
Look, all you have to do is keep him mildly distracted while we sweep his house.
I'll have my guys head out front, keep the PD distracted, and we'll move her out back.
Can you take my mind off of me? Talk about anything.
It's important we don't get distracted from that goal...
She's Allowed To Ask It, But You're Not Allowed To Pay Any Attention, So Just Keep Going.
I let things get in the way before. There was something I thought I had to do. I don't have to.
